1600740.name: In My Shadow - Soundtrack
1600740.description:
The official soundtrack of 'In My Shadow' featuring music by Vishwas V_V who added soul into the music of this game.
NOTE : The Sountrack is already included in the base Game Package.

FEATURES

  • In My Shadow features a very melodic and emotional soundtrack
  • Specifically composed and designed to be a seamless experience as you solve shadow puzzles and go through Bella's childhood memories.
  • The Soundtrack is divided into the 6 different tracks - 1 for every phase of the game.
  • The continuous flow of the music in each track lets you absorb the exact emotion that Bella is going through in that part of her dream.
